subject: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Friend,
  How are you doing Today, My name is Mr.ssa Isman,and I am the Bill
and Exchange Assistant Manager BOA Bank of Afrlca. I have a business
deal worth ( US$18.3 Million Dollars )to execute with you, it's
legitimate' legal and your personal Identity will not be compromised,
Will I have your support to achieve this great opportunity
Yours Sincerely,
Mr.Issa Isman

subject: Re: Dear Friend,
body:
Dear Isman,

Thank you for your message. I'm doing well, thank you. 

Before we proceed with this business deal, could you please provide more details about it? What exactly does it involve and what would be my role in it?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Frank
